    public final class JsonAccountDao
extends Object
implements AccountDao
    Implementation class for persisting/retrieving data from a JSON file.

    AndrewStefanich

      • close

        public void close()
           throws AccountException
        Close the DAO. Release any resources used by the DAO implementation. If the DAO is already closed then invoking this method has no effect.
        Specified by:
